title.rendered: Snuggledown get cosy at new 3PL Retail Distribution Centre

content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]3PL, the UK’s leading multichannel ecommerce fulfilment and logistics provider, announces an exciting new partnership with leading British pillow and duvet manufacturer Snuggledown, one of the UK’s leading destinations for warmth and comfort.

Originally founded in Norway, Snuggledown have been painstakingly perfecting the artisan skills of duvet making since 1901 and today combine years of experience with the latest technologies and the very best of British research, development and workmanship.

3PL will be supporting Snuggledown with stock storage and general warehousing solutions as the brand continues to grow and expand its range of duvets and pillows.

“We are delighted to welcome Snuggledown on board to join our every growing list of renowned brands that form our client base” John Scully, Business Development Manager at 3PL commented “We look forward to working with them for their present storage needs and expanding thereafter with our comprehensive range of value-added services.” 

To shop the latest Snuggledown collections, visit www.snuggledown.co.uk

 

About 3PL

Based in Wigan, 3PL provides multichannel ecommerce fulfilment & logistics to fast growing brands. As an end-to-end fulfilment solution, 3PL operates from over 250,000 sq. ft of shared user warehousing in the UK, supported by access to a network of International warehouses to support International expansion for its clients. Its fast-moving operations house over 9 million units of stock, across 32,000 product lines.

About Snuggledown

Founded in 1901 in Norway, Snuggledown are now one of the UK’s leading manufacturers of high quality duvets and pillows.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
